headline.main: ITALY'S GOAL DEFINED AS FASCIST TRIUMPH; ' Whip Defeatists Until They Bleed,' Farinacci Urges Aides

lead_paragraph: ROME, Oct. 14 -- Italy is fighting for world-wide triumph of the Fascist idea, Roberto Farinacci said on Sunday in a speech at Crema, which the Regime Fascista publishes today. It is rare here to see emphasis placed on the international scope of fascism, but the speech also was interesting as an exhortation to strong-arm methods in internal affairs.
abstract: R Farinacci s on final Ital victory pub in Rome Regime Fascista

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
